name: @vlsergey/react-bootstrap-pagination
description: Ready-to-use wrapper for react-bootstrap Pagation component

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-cjs.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p ./src/tsconfig-esm.json
scripts.eslint:check: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" .eslintrc.js karma.conf.js src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx test/**/*.js test/**/*.ts
scripts.eslint:fix: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" --fix .eslintrc.js karma.conf.js src/**/*.ts src/**/*.tsx test/**/*.js test/**/*.ts
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run eslint:fix && npm test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Sergey Vladimirov <vlsergey@gmail.com>
